metadata.title: CVE-2013-2561 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
OpenFabrics ibutils 1.5.7 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on (1) ibdiagnet.db, (2) ibdiagnet.fdbs, (3)ibdiagnet_ibis.log, (4) ibdiagnet.log, (5) ibdiagnet.lst, (6)ibdiagnet.mcfdbs, (7) ibdiagnet.pkey, (8) ibdiagnet.psl, (9)ibdiagnet.slvl, or (10) ibdiagnet.sm in /tmp/.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ibutils - 1.5.7-3ubuntu3
libibdm1v5 - 1.5.7-3ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ibutils package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.7-3ubuntu3').
